projects.title: Rocket Elevators Website (Static Front-End)
projects.description: Rebuilt static website from legacy Smarty template to modern HTML/CSS with brand identity.

modalData.problem: The existing website was based on a Smarty Template and did not reflect the Rocket Elevators brand or business requirements.
modalData.solution: Rebuilt the website by removing all template-specific references, updating content and links, and creating new pages aligned with the Rocket Elevators identity.
lessons: Understanding and refactoring legacy HTML templates
Styling pages using CSS for branding and readability

projects.title: Elevator Quote Form
projects.description: Dynamic pricing calculator with Bootstrap and JavaScript for elevator installations.

modalData.problem: There was no system in place to generate elevator pricing based on different building types.
modalData.solution: Designed and implemented a dynamic quote form that calculates pricing based on user input and building specifications.
lessons: Handling user input and form validation
Implementing business logic on the client side

projects.title: Introduction to Node.js & Express
projects.description: First backend server with Express, learning RESTful APIs and client-server architecture.

modalData.problem: Lack of understanding of how server-side applications work with Node.js and Express.
modalData.solution: Created a simple backend server using Express with basic endpoints to handle requests and responses.
lessons: Organizing a basic backend project structure

projects.title: Node.js Backend with Database
projects.description: Extended Express server with MongoDB integration using Mongoose for data persistence.

modalData.problem: No experience connecting a backend server to a database.
modalData.solution: Extended the Express server by integrating MongoDB for data storage and management using Mongoose.
lessons: Connecting a backend to a NoSQL database
Designing schemas and models with Mongoose

projects.title: Agent Management Web Application
projects.description: Full MERN stack admin app with authentication, CRUD operations, and reporting dashboards.

modalData.problem: A web application was needed to manage agents, authentication, and operational data.
modalData.solution: Built a full MERN stack admin application with authentication, session tokens, CRUD operations, reporting, and transaction management.
lessons: Connecting frontend and backend in a production-ready app

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: MERN blog with user authentication, role-based access, post management, and comments.

modalData.problem: A complete blogging system was required to manage content and users.
modalData.solution: Developed a MERN-based blog application with user registration, authentication, post creation, comments, and admin content management.

projects.title: Rocket Food Back Office
projects.description: Java backend with MySQL for administrative data management of mobile application.

modalData.problem: The Rocket Food mobile application lacked a back-office system for managing data.
modalData.solution: Developed a backend server and administrative back office using Java to manage application data.
lessons: Building admin tools for data management
Applying MVC concepts in backend systems

projects.title: Mobile Application Development
projects.description: React Native mobile app connected to Java backend for cross-platform food delivery.

modalData.problem: No mobile application was available for users.
modalData.solution: Built a mobile application using React Native and connected it to the existing Java backend server.
lessons: Connecting mobile apps to backend APIs

projects.title: AI-Enhanced Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio! Built with HTML/CSS/JS using AI tools for rapid development and optimization.

modalData.problem: Creating a professional portfolio from scratch is time-consuming and requires balancing design, functionality, and best practices.
modalData.solution: Leveraged AI tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, Claude) to rapidly prototype and build this interactive portfolio with advanced animations, accessibility features, and modern UX patterns.
lessons: Advanced prompt engineering for code generation
Effective use of AI for rapid prototyping and iteration
Combining AI suggestions with human expertise
